p: Comparisons of different types of HRV (HRV-A, HRV-B and HRV-C) identified found that there was no association between the various types of HRV in both AECOPD and asthma exacerbations with hospital LOS, readmission and mortality. The results of the relationships of HRV types and clinical outcomes of AECOPD and asthma exacerbation are shown in Additional file 1: Tables S1 and S2 respectively.
